title: Zeit as a Feather, Stiff as a Board 8/17: Jam Master Jay, Robert Trump, LA Fitness, Messi
itunes:title: Zeit as a Feather, Stiff as a Board 8/17: Jam Master Jay, Robert Trump, LA Fitness, Messi
description:
On this edition of Zeit as a Feather, Stiff as a Board Miles and DJ Danl discuss two long-time suspects arrested for the murder of Jam Master Jay, Trump had some words about his brother after his passing, the commentators for the Nuggets v Jazz game had a little fun, and Lionel Messi is considering leaving Barcelona.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
